holidays.title: International Waffle Day
holidays.description: Plug in your waffle maker and tuck into some mouth-watering treats.

holidays.title: Anniversary Of The Arengo
holidays.description: San Marino, Europe's oldest state, is commemorating its initial form of governance today.

holidays.title: Bed-in for Peace Day
holidays.description: The bed-in protest is a peaceful yet powerful way to protest for a cause.

holidays.title: Earth Hour
holidays.description: We are a step closer to protecting our planet, and it starts with you switching off your lights for an hour.

holidays.title: Feast of the Annunciation
holidays.description: Celebrate the day that a virgin was told that she would somehow birth a special child.

holidays.title: Greek Independence Day
holidays.description: The fight for freedom is always a true fight. Let’s honor our Greek freedom fighters today.

holidays.title: International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and the Transatlantic Slave Trade
holidays.description: Join us in raising awareness about the consequences of slavery and prejudice today.

holidays.title: International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and the Transatlantic Slave Trade
holidays.description: We take more time today to honor the victims and champion the cause for equality.

holidays.title: International Day of Solidarity with Detained and Missing Staff Members
holidays.description: Stand with the fallen members of the United Nations today in the fight for world peace.

holidays.title: International Day of the Unborn Child
holidays.description: Today, we honor life and commemorate the lives of unborn infants all over the world.

holidays.title: ​Maryland Day
holidays.description: The story behind Maryland Day is one for the ages.

holidays.title: National Dante Day
holidays.description: Dante Alighieri was one of the most incredible minds in literature and that deserves a celebration.

holidays.title: National Guadalupe Day
holidays.description: The name Guadalupe is common in Spanish-speaking countries like Spain, Mexico, and Latin America.

holidays.title: National Lobster Newburg Day
holidays.description: It wasn’t invented by a honed professional chef, but by a sea captain named Ben Wenburg.

holidays.title: National Medal of Honor Day
holidays.description: We honor the valor displayed by America's most courageous servicemen and servicewomen.

holidays.title: National Michelle Shafer Half-Moon Cookie Day
holidays.description: Prepare your tummy to eat as many half-moon cookies as you can.

holidays.title: National OmazingYou Day
holidays.description: Here's what you can do to have an amazing and fun day that's all about you!

holidays.title: Old New Year's Day
holidays.description: Have your second celebration of the new year on this Old New Year's Day!

holidays.title: Struggle For Human Rights Day
holidays.description: Let's walk down Hviezdoslav street and remember the struggle for freedom on this day!

holidays.title: Tolkien Reading Day
holidays.description: Escape the ho-hum world here on Earth for the otherworldly, magical land of Middle-earth.

holidays.title: Walk in the Sand Day
holidays.description: Head to the beach, kick off your shoes, and let the sand caress your feet.

holidays.title: World Retrospective Day
holidays.description: Learn how to look back and plan forward, at the same time, with these smart tidbits.

holidays.title: Aretha Franklin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Singer, songwriter and pianist, the Queen of Soul was a force to be reckoned with!

holidays.title: Big Sean’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this hip-hop and songwriter sensation, the world is his oyster! Celebrate him today!

holidays.title: Elton John’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about the iconic and immensely talented singer, Elton John, right here!

holidays.title: Sarah Jessica Parker’s Birthday
holidays.description: We love a good success story and this actress happens to have a good one!

holidays.title: Sha'Carri Richardson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This powerhouse athlete has both speed and swagger and we celebrate her prowess.
